Uses of Interface
simpledb.DbFile

    • Uses of DbFile in simpledb

      Classes in simpledb that implement DbFile 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HeapFile
      HeapFile is an implementation of a DbFile that stores a collection of tuples in no particular order.
      Fields in simpledb declared as DbFile 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) DbFile Catalog.CatalogItem.dbFile 
      Methods in simpledb that return DbFile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DbFile Catalog.getDbFile(int tableid)
      Returns the DbFile that can be used to read the contents of the specified table.
